## R Markdown

##Setting universal parameters we will be using
```{r Set Parameters}
##Lets first set a seed
set.seed(1)

##Set parameters
b_0 = 3
b_1 = 2
sigma_2 = 2
n = 300
```

##The following markdown section will be used to create the A1 distribution
```{r A1 Distribution}
##Create the distribution
x = sort(runif(n,min=0,max=100))
e = rnorm(n,0,sqrt(sigma_2))
y = b_0 + b_1*x + e

##Plot the distribution 
plot(y~x,main='A1 Generated Data',xlab='X',ylab='Y')
abline(b_0,b_1,col='red')
```
